name: Automatic File Headers
description: Automatically configures VS Code file headers with customizable templates based on project, license, company, and contributors information.

headerType.description: Header style: 'simple' (project + copyright + license) or 'custom' (user-defined lines)

projectName.description: Project name to include in headers (auto-detects from directory name if empty)

license.description: SPDX license identifier (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0, AGPL-3.0)

sinceYear.description: Copyright start year (optional, defaults to current year if not provided)

customHeaderLines.description: Custom header content (required when headerType is 'custom'). Multiple lines separated by \n
